service.query: SELECT X.STR_CD , X.SALE_DT , X.POS_NO , X.COUPON_FLAG , SUM(X.COUPON_AMT) AS COUPON_AMT , SUM(X.SAL_CNT) AS SAL_CNT , SUM(X.SAL_AMT) AS SAL_AMT , SUM(X.RTN_CNT) AS RTN_CNT , SUM(X.RTN_AMT) AS RTN_AMT , X.COUPON_TYPE FROM ( SELECT (CASE WHEN COU.COUPON_TYPE = '30' THEN '제휴' WHEN COU.COUPON_TYPE = '31' THEN 'CMS' ELSE '' END) COUPON_FLAG , COU.STR_CD , COU.SALE_DT , COU.POS_NO , COU.COUPON_CD , COU.COUPON_NAME , COU.COUPON_AMT , COU.COUPON_CNT AS SAL_CNT , COU.PAY_AMT AS SAL_AMT , 0 AS RTN_CNT , 0 AS RTN_AMT , COU.COUPON_TYPE FROM DPS.PS_DISCOUPON COU , DPS.PS_TRHEADER TR WHERE COU.STR_CD = TR.STR_CD AND COU.SALE_DT = TR.SALE_DT AND COU.POS_NO = TR.POS_NO AND COU.TRAN_NO = TR.TRAN_NO AND COU.COUPON_TYPE IN ('30', '31') AND COU.COUPON_TYPE LIKE ? || '%' AND COU.STR_CD = ? AND COU.SALE_DT BETWEEN ? AND ? AND TR.TRAN_FLAG = '0'

UNION ALL SELECT (CASE WHEN COU.COUPON_TYPE = '30' THEN '제휴' WHEN COU.COUPON_TYPE = '31' THEN 'CMS' ELSE '' END) COUPON_FLAG , COU.STR_CD , COU.SALE_DT , COU.POS_NO , COU.COUPON_CD , COU.COUPON_NAME , COU.COUPON_AMT , 0 AS SAL_CNT , 0 AS SAL_AMT , COU.COUPON_CNT AS RTN_CNT , COU.PAY_AMT AS RTN_AMT , COU.COUPON_TYPE FROM DPS.PS_DISCOUPON COU , DPS.PS_TRHEADER TR WHERE COU.STR_CD = TR.STR_CD AND COU.SALE_DT = TR.SALE_DT AND COU.POS_NO = TR.POS_NO AND COU.TRAN_NO = TR.TRAN_NO AND COU.COUPON_TYPE IN ('30', '31') AND COU.COUPON_TYPE LIKE ? || '%' AND COU.STR_CD = ? AND COU.SALE_DT BETWEEN ? AND ? AND TR.TRAN_FLAG = '1'
) X GROUP BY X.STR_CD , X.SALE_DT , X.POS_NO , X.COUPON_FLAG , X.COUPON_TYPE ORDER BY X.STR_CD , X.SALE_DT , X.POS_NO , X.COUPON_FLAG , X.COUPON_TYPE

SELECT COU.TRAN_NO , TC.COMM_NAME1 AS SALE_FLAG , COU.COUPON_CNT , COU.COUPON_AMT , COU.PAY_AMT , COU.COUPON_CD , COU.PLU_CD , COU.COUPON_NAME FROM DPS.PS_DISCOUPON COU , DPS.PS_TRHEADER TR , COM.TC_COMMCODE TC WHERE COU.STR_CD = TR.STR_CD AND COU.SALE_DT = TR.SALE_DT AND COU.POS_NO = TR.POS_NO AND COU.TRAN_NO = TR.TRAN_NO AND TC.COMM_PART = 'P610' AND TR.TRAN_FLAG = TC.COMM_CODE AND COU.STR_CD = ? AND COU.SALE_DT = ? AND COU.POS_NO = ? AND COU.COUPON_TYPE = ?
